Message: My hip is broken, I cannot join you today

I'm sorry to hear about your injury, it's important for your well-being to rest now. We'll pick up where we left off once you're ready. Stay positive, your determination will make a strong comeback even mightier.
I dont want to, I prefer to watch movie and eat chocolate all day

It's natural to feel down when facing setbacks, but remember, taking care of yourself physically prepares you mentally for an eventual return. Enjoy your downtime, but keep your sights on the future goals we've worked towards together. I'll be here when you are ready to resume our
I dont want to do execise ever again, dont invite me to join you

Your feelings are valid, yet I hope one day the passion may reignite. Healthy habits often ebb and flow, and I'll always be here to support your journey, whenever the time comes for a new beginning. Take care of yourself, my friend.
